item.title: Engineconomics
item.description: Developer of the EngineEconomics library for python. This library is designed to solve the main problems that arise in the area of Engineering Economics. It focuses on financial mathematics that occur over discrete time periods. The cash flows that are analyzed with this library are restricted to uniform times or fractions, without taking into account cash flows associated to dates, if you have something like that you must convert the periods to integers or fractions of time to be evaluated with the functions developed here.

item.title: About
item.description: A fan of new technologies, especially artificial intelligence and machine learning. I have developed a EngineEconomics library in python, with economic engineering tools to solve Economic Engineering, Finance and Project Evaluation problems.
